title: Weather advisory issued for heavy rain
content: The Department of Meteorology has issued an advisory for heavy rain for Sabaragamuwa, Central, Uva and North-Central provinces and in Kaluthara, Galle and Matara districts.Heavy showers above 100mm can be expected at some places in Sabaragamuwa, Central, Uva and North-Central provinces and in Kaluthara, Galle and Matara districts, it said.
